ClassDesc: Adapt a SAX1 Parser as a SAX2 XMLReader. This class wraps a SAX1 @B_org#xml#sax#Parser_E@ and makes it act as a SAX2 @B_org#xml#sax#XMLReader_E@, with feature, property, and Namespace support. Note that it is not possible to report @B_org#xml#sax#ContentHandler#skippedEntity_E@ events, since SAX1 does not make that information available. This adapter does not test for duplicate Namespace-qualified attribute names.
